page.title: 07CHILDRENS FASHION
page.content: We are children living in a rural community and we are moderate in our choice of clothes.In school the boys wear denim jeans,"bagies"(cotton jeans with pockets,studs and zips)cords,or dark trousers,with grey or luminous socks and trainers or light weight shoes.Tops vary with cotton shirts, T-shirts or sweatshirts,T-bags (shirts with holes)and knitted jumpers being the most common.Girls dress in pastel colours leisure suits,dresses, blouses and skirts,with light socks and sandal s, trainers,light shoes or tuckerboots (short suede boots.)Out of school we are fashionable with white Trousers and jackets,and easy to where leisure outfits.Jewelry is large and colourful Hair fashion-boys have neck length styles with{tails}Girls-short flicked back or long tied back.Outside wear,waterproof clothes.
